mapper.insert: insert into EV_user (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_email, area_ctpy_nm, area_sgg_nm, area_emd_nm) values (#{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{area_ctpy_nm}, #{area_sgg_nm}, #{area_emd_nm})
mapper.select: select count(*) from EV_user where user_id=#{user_id}
select count(*) from EV_user where user_id=#{user_id} and user_password=#{user_password}
select area_ctpy_cd, area_sgg_cd, area_emd_cd from EV_user where user_id=#{user_id};
